title: Gab & Juls: Can Arsenal Challenge Man City?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss the two Premier League derbies of the weekend, as Arsenal beat Tottenham to add momentum to their title challenge and Manchester City make light work of a Manchester United that Erik ten Hag set up wrong. The guys also discuss Karim Benzema's penalty woes at Real Madrid, Robert Lewandowski’s wonder-strike, and ask why Liverpool continue to underwhelm.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Arsenal's chances at challenging Man City for the title; Ten Hag gets his team all wrong; Benzema's penalty woes
